Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 4th overall pick, by Pittsburgh in 1971...
Had first career hit (triple) on 4/1/1975, off Bill Dillman (ATL)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/22/1975, off Dennis Daboll (CIN)...
Hit for the cycle against Atlanta on 5/21/1975...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against Atlanta on 5/21/1975...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/9/1975, hitting .435 with 1 HR, 5 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against Philadelphia on 9/13/1977...
Won Batter of the Month award on 6/1/1978, hitting .325 with 4 HR, 27 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against New York (N) on 6/9/1978...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Los Angeles on 6/19/1978...
Was selected to the 1978 Allstar game...
Won Batter of the Month award on 5/1/1981, hitting .357 with 8 HR, 32 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/9/1981, hitting .444 with 6 HR, 13 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 7/1/1981, hitting .333 with 10 HR, 29 RBI...
Was selected to the 1981 Allstar game...
Won Batter of the Month award on 10/1/1981, hitting .385 with 6 HR, 26 RBI...
Won MVP Award in 1981, hitting .322 with 34 HR, 152 RBI...
Had 6 hits with 8 RBI against Houston on 4/28/1982...
Was selected to the 1982 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/8/1982, hitting .484 with 3 HR, 16 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against Cincinnati on 9/5/1983...
Signed as a free agent by Chicago (N) on 2/1/1984 to a 4-year deal worth $14,200,000 per year...
Traded from Chicago (N) to Texas on 5/12/1985 (Going to CHC: LF P. Incaviglia. Going to TEX: 1B J. Rice)...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/14/1985, hitting .400 with 2 HR, 10 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 9/1/1985, hitting .373 with 5 HR, 26 RBI...
